description: This file provides a data service interface for interacting with a Supabase backend, including user authentication, profile management, and request handling for a vehicle rescue platform.

methods.name: supaUserToAppUser
methods.description: Converts a Supabase auth user object into a minimal application user object with role and approval status.

methods.name: normalizeVehicle
methods.description: Normalizes vehicle data from database row or input object to a standardized {make, model} format.

methods.name: normalizeContact
methods.description: Normalizes contact data from database row or input object to a standardized {name, phone} format.

methods.name: normalizeSupabaseAuthError
methods.description: Converts Supabase auth error messages into user-friendly strings.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password via Supabase auth.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Logs in a user with email and password via Supabase auth.

methods.name: loginWithGoogle
methods.description: Initiates OAuth login with Google via Supabase.

methods.name: getUserFromSession
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user based on session cache.

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user directly from Supabase.

methods.name: subscribeToAuthChanges
methods.description: Subscribes to authentication state changes and provides user info updates.

methods.name: getProfile
methods.description: Fetches user profile data from the 'profiles' table.

methods.name: listRequests
methods.description: Lists vehicle rescue requests, optionally filtered by user ID.

methods.name: getRequestById
methods.description: Fetches a specific request by its ID.

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: Creates a new vehicle rescue request with provided details.

methods.name: isSupabaseConfigured
methods.description: Checks if Supabase environment variables are configured.
